text: @simmonssteve From the #DominoEffect department... It's #AustonMatthews  now... But how many more Leaf players, coaches and onward come down with #COVID19 plus those working at the arena or Hotel where the Leafs are encamped plus any media who may have interviewed Matthews... Plus...

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
